variable.name: VERS
variable.description: Form Version

variable.name: FSS1
variable.description: Since the last time we administered this questionnaire to you, have you been told by a physician that you had a stroke?

variable.name: FSS3
variable.description: Since the last time we administered this questionnaire to you, have you had any sudden loss or changes in speech lasting 24 hours or longer?

variable.name: FSS4
variable.description: Did the episode (of sudden loss or changes in speech lasting 24 hours or longer) come on suddenly?

variable.name: FSS5A
variable.description: Do any of the following describe your change in speech? Slurred speech like you were drunk

variable.name: FSS5B
variable.description: Do any of the following describe your change in speech? Could talk but the wrong words came out

variable.name: FSS5C
variable.description: Do any of the following describe your change in speech? Knew what you wanted to say, but the words would not come out

variable.name: FSS5D
variable.description: Do any of the following describe your change in speech? Could not think of right words

variable.name: FSS5E
variable.description: Do any of the following describe your change in speech? If more than one, which of the above most closely describes your problem

variable.name: FSS6A
variable.description: While you were having your episode of change in speech, did any of the following occur? Numbness or tingling

variable.name: FSS6B
variable.description: While you were having your episode of change in speech, did any of the following occur? Did you have difficulty on:

variable.name: FSS6C
variable.description: While you were having your episode of change in speech, did any of the following occur? Paralysis or weakness

variable.name: FSS6D
variable.description: While you were having your episode of change in speech, did any of the following occur? Did you have difficulty on:

variable.name: FSS6E
variable.description: While you were having your episode of change in speech, did any of the following occur? Lightheadedness, dizziness, or loss of balance

variable.name: FSS6F
variable.description: While you were having your episode of change in speech, did any of the following occur? Blackouts or fainting

variable.name: FSS6G
variable.description: While you were having your episode of change in speech, did any of the following occur? Seizures or convulsions

variable.name: FSS6H
variable.description: While you were having your episode of change in speech, did any of the following occur? Headache

variable.name: FSS6I
variable.description: While you were having your episode of change in speech, did any of the following occur? Visual Disturbances

variable.name: FSS6J
variable.description: While you were having your episode of change in speech, did any of the following occur? Did you have:
variable.value: Trouble in both eyes seeing to - R
Trouble in both eyes seeing to - L
Trouble in both eyes seeing to both sides and straight ahead - B

variable.name: FSS7
variable.description: Since the last time we administered this questionnaire to you, have you had any sudden loss of vision, or blurring, lasting 24 hours or longer?

variable.name: FSS8
variable.description: Since the last time we administered this questionnaire to you, have you had any sudden loss of vision, or blurring, lasting 24 hours or longer: Did the episode come on suddenly?

variable.name: FSS9
variable.description: During the episode, which of the following parts of your vision were affected?

variable.name: FSS9A
variable.description: During the episode (sudden loss of vision/blurring) , which of the following parts of your vision were affected? Did you have:
variable.value: Trouble - seeing both sides or straight ahead
Trouble - seeing to the left side
Trouble - seeing to the right side

variable.name: FSS10A
variable.description: While you were having your loss of vision, did any of the following occur? Speech disturbance

variable.name: FSS10B
variable.description: While you were having your loss of vision, did any of the following occur? Numbness or tingling

variable.name: FSS10C
variable.description: While you were having your loss of vision, did any of the following occur? Did you have difficulty on:

variable.name: FSS10D
variable.description: While you were having your loss of vision, did any of the following occur? Paralysis or weakness

variable.name: FSS10E
variable.description: While you were having your loss of vision, did any of the following occur? Did you have difficulty on:

variable.name: FSS10F
variable.description: While you were having your loss of vision, did any of the following occur? Lightheadedness, dizziness, or loss of balance

variable.name: FSS10G
variable.description: While you were having your loss of vision, did any of the following occur? Blackouts or fainting

variable.name: FSS10H
variable.description: While you were having your loss of vision, did any of the following occur? Seizures or convulsions

variable.name: FSS10I
variable.description: While you were having your loss of vision, did any of the following occur? Headache

variable.name: FSS10J
variable.description: While you were having your loss of vision, did any of the following occur? Flashing lights

variable.name: FSS11
variable.description: Since the last time we administered this questionnaire to you, have you had a sudden spell of double vision, which lasted 24 hours or longer?

variable.name: FSS11A
variable.description: If you closed one eye, did the double vision go away?

variable.name: FSS12
variable.description: Did the episode (of double vision) come on suddenly?

variable.name: FSS13A
variable.description: While you were having your double vision, did any of the following occur? Speech disturbances

variable.name: FSS13B
variable.description: While you were having your double vision, did any of the following occur? Numbness or tingling

variable.name: FSS13C
variable.description: While you were having your double vision, did any of the following occur? Did you have difficulty on:

variable.name: FSS13D
variable.description: While you were having your double vision, did any of the following occur? Paralysis or weakness

variable.name: FSS13E
variable.description: While you were having your double vision, did any of the following occur? Did you have difficulty on:

variable.name: FSS13F
variable.description: While you were having your double vision, did any of the following occur? Lightheadedness, dizziness, or loss of balance

variable.name: FSS13G
variable.description: While you were having your double vision, did any of the following occur? Blackouts or fainting

variable.name: FSS13H
variable.description: While you were having your double vision, did any of the following occur? Seizures or convulsions

variable.name: FSS13I
variable.description: While you were having your double vision, did any of the following occur? Headache

variable.name: FSS14
variable.description: Since the last time we administered this questionnaire to you, have you had sudden numbness, tingling, or loss of feeling on one side of your body, including your face, arm, or leg which lasted 24 hours or longer?

variable.name: FSS15
variable.description: Did the feeling of numbness or tingling occur only when you kept your arms or legs in a certain position?

variable.name: FSS16
variable.description: Did the episode (of numbness or tingling) come on suddenly?

variable.name: FSS17A
variable.description: During the episode of sudden numbness or tingling, which part or parts of your body were affected? Left arm or hand

variable.name: FSS17B
variable.description: During the episode of sudden numbness or tingling, which part or parts of your body were affected? Left leg or foot

variable.name: FSS17C
variable.description: During the episode of sudden numbness or tingling, which part or parts of your body were affected? Left side of face

variable.name: FSS17D
variable.description: During the episode of sudden numbness or tingling, which part or parts of your body were affected? Right arm or hand

variable.name: FSS17E
variable.description: During the episode of sudden numbness or tingling, which part or parts of your body were affected? Right leg or foot

variable.name: FSS17F
variable.description: During the episode of sudden numbness or tingling, which part or parts of your body were affected? Right side of face

variable.name: FSS17G
variable.description: During the episode of sudden numbness or tingling, which part or parts of your body were affected? Other

variable.name: FSS18
variable.description: During this episode (of numbness or tingling), did the abnormal sensation start in one part of your body and spread to another, or did it stay in the same place?
variable.value: In one part and spread to another

variable.name: FSS19A
variable.description: While you were having your episode of numbness, tingling or loss of sensation, did any of the following occur? Speech disturbance

variable.name: FSS19B
variable.description: While you were having your episode of numbness, tingling or loss of sensation, did any of the following occur? Paralysis or weakness

variable.name: FSS19C
variable.description: While you were having your episode of numbness, tingling or loss of sensation, did any of the following occur? Did you have difficulty on:

variable.name: FSS19D
variable.description: While you were having your episode of numbness, tingling or loss of sensation, did any of the following occur? Lightheadedness, dizziness, or loss of balance

variable.name: FSS19E
variable.description: While you were having your episode of numbness, tingling or loss of sensation, did any of the following occur? Blackouts or fainting

variable.name: FSS19F
variable.description: While you were having your episode of numbness, tingling or loss of sensation, did any of the following occur? Seizures or convulsions

variable.name: FSS19G
variable.description: While you were having your episode of numbness, tingling or loss of sensation, did any of the following occur? Headache

variable.name: FSS19H
variable.description: While you were having your episode of numbness, tingling or loss of sensation, did any of the following occur? Pain in the numb or tingling arm, leg or face

variable.name: FSS19I
variable.description: While you were having your episode of numbness, tingling or loss of sensation, did any of the following occur? Visual Disturbances

variable.name: FSS19J
variable.description: While you were having your episode of numbness, tingling or loss of sensation, did any of the following occur? Did you have:
variable.value: Trouble in both eyes seeing to - R
Trouble in both eyes seeing to - L
Trouble in both eyes seeing to both sides and straight ahead - B

variable.name: FSS20
variable.description: Since the last time we administered this questionnaire to you, have you had any sudden episode of paralysis or weakness on one side of your body, including your face, arm, or leg which lasted at least 24 hours?

variable.name: FSS21
variable.description: Did the episode (of paralysis or weakness on one side of your body, including your face, arm, or leg which lasted at least 24 hours) come on suddenly?

variable.name: FSS22A
variable.description: During this episode (of paralysis or weakness on one side of your body, including your face, arm, or leg which lasted at least 24 hours), which part or parts of your body were affected? Left arm or hand

variable.name: FSS22B
variable.description: During this episode (of paralysis or weakness on one side of your body, including your face, arm, or leg which lasted at least 24 hours), which part or parts of your body were affected? Left leg or foot

variable.name: FSS22C
variable.description: During this episode (of paralysis or weakness on one side of your body, including your face, arm, or leg which lasted at least 24 hours), which part or parts of your body were affected? Left side of face

variable.name: FSS22D
variable.description: During this episode (of paralysis or weakness on one side of your body, including your face, arm, or leg which lasted at least 24 hours), which part or parts of your body were affected? Right arm or hand

variable.name: FSS22E
variable.description: During this episode (of paralysis or weakness on one side of your body, including your face, arm, or leg which lasted at least 24 hours), which part or parts of your body were affected? Right leg or foot

variable.name: FSS22F
variable.description: During this episode, which part or parts of your body were affected? Right side of face

variable.name: FSS22G
variable.description: During this episode, which part or parts of your body were affected? Other

variable.name: FSS23
variable.description: During this episode, did the paralysis or weakness start in one part of your body and spread to another, or did it stay in the same place?
variable.value: In one part and spread to another

variable.name: FSS24A
variable.description: While you were having your episode of paralysis or weakness, did any of the following occur? {INCLUDE ALL THAT APPLY} Speech disturbances

variable.name: FSS24B
variable.description: While you were having your episode of paralysis or weakness, did any of the following occur? {INCLUDE ALL THAT APPLY} Numbness or tingling

variable.name: FSS24C
variable.description: While you were having your episode of paralysis or weakness, did any of the following occur? {INCLUDE ALL THAT APPLY} Did you have difficulty on:

variable.name: FSS24D
variable.description: While you were having your episode of paralysis or weakness, did any of the following occur? {INCLUDE ALL THAT APPLY} Lightheadedness, dizziness, or loss of balance

variable.name: FSS24E
variable.description: While you were having your episode of paralysis or weakness, did any of the following occur? {INCLUDE ALL THAT APPLY} Blackouts or fainting

variable.name: FSS24F
variable.description: While you were having your episode of paralysis or weakness, did any of the following occur? {INCLUDE ALL THAT APPLY} Seizures or convulsions

variable.name: FSS24G
variable.description: While you were having your episode of paralysis or weakness, did any of the following occur? {INCLUDE ALL THAT APPLY} Headache

variable.name: FSS24H
variable.description: While you were having your episode of paralysis or weakness, did any of the following occur? {INCLUDE ALL THAT APPLY} Pain in the weak arm, leg or face

variable.name: FSS24I
variable.description: While you were having your episode of paralysis or weakness, did any of the following occur? {INCLUDE ALL THAT APPLY} Visual Disturbances

variable.name: FSS24J
variable.description: While you were having your episode of paralysis or weakness, did any of the following occur? {INCLUDE ALL THAT APPLY} Did you have:
variable.value: Trouble in both eyes seeing to - R
Trouble in both eyes seeing to - L
Trouble in both eyes seeing to both sides and straight ahead - B

variable.name: FSS25
variable.description: Since the last time we administered this questionnaire to you, have you had any sudden spells of dizziness, loss of balance, or sensation of spinning which lasted 24 hours or longer?

variable.name: FSS26
variable.description: Did the dizziness, loss of balance or spinning sensation occur only when changing the position of your head or body?

variable.name: FSS27A
variable.description: While you were having your episode of dizziness, loss of balance or spinning sensation, did any of the following occur? {INCLUDE ALL THAT APPLY} Speech disturbances

variable.name: FSS27B
variable.description: While you were having your episode of dizziness, loss of balance or spinning sensation, did any of the following occur? {INCLUDE ALL THAT APPLY} Paralysis or weakness.

variable.name: FSS27C
variable.description: While you were having your episode of dizziness, loss of balance or spinning sensation, did any of the following occur? {INCLUDE ALL THAT APPLY} Did you have difficulty on:

variable.name: FSS27D
variable.description: While you were having your episode of dizziness, loss of balance or spinning sensation, did any of the following occur? {INCLUDE ALL THAT APPLY} Numbness or tingling.

variable.name: FSS27E
variable.description: While you were having your episode of dizziness, loss of balance or spinning sensation, did any of the following occur? {INCLUDE ALL THAT APPLY} Did you have difficulty on:

variable.name: FSS27F
variable.description: While you were having your episode of dizziness, loss of balance or spinning sensation, did any of the following occur? {INCLUDE ALL THAT APPLY} Blackouts or fainting

variable.name: FSS27G
variable.description: While you were having your episode of dizziness, loss of balance or spinning sensation, did any of the following occur? {INCLUDE ALL THAT APPLY} Seizures or convulsions

variable.name: FSS27H
variable.description: While you were having your episode of dizziness, loss of balance or spinning sensation, did any of the following occur? {INCLUDE ALL THAT APPLY} Headache

variable.name: FSS27I
variable.description: While you were having your episode of dizziness, loss of balance or spinning sensation, did any of the following occur? {INCLUDE ALL THAT APPLY} Visual Disturbances

variable.name: FSS27J
variable.description: While you were having your episode of dizziness, loss of balance or spinning sensation, did any of the following occur? {INCLUDE ALL THAT APPLY} Did you have:
variable.value: Trouble in both eyes seeing to - R
Trouble in both eyes seeing to - L
Trouble in both eyes seeing to both sides and straight ahead - B

variable.name: FSS28
variable.description: Did the episode of dizziness, or loss of balance, or spinning sensation come on suddenly?

variable.name: FSS29
variable.description: Diagnosis from Stroke Eligibility Algorithm: Section B - Loss or Change of Speech

variable.name: FSS30
variable.description: Diagnosis from Stroke Eligibility Algorithm: Section C - Loss of Vision

variable.name: FSS31
variable.description: Diagnosis from Stroke Eligibility Algorithm: Section D - Double Vision

variable.name: FSS32
variable.description: Diagnosis from Stroke Eligibility Algorithm: Section E - Numbness or Tingling

variable.name: FSS33
variable.description: Diagnosis from Stroke Eligibility Algorithm: Section F - Paralysis or Weakness

variable.name: FSS34
variable.description: Diagnosis from Stroke Eligibility Algorithm: Section G - Dizziness or Loss of Balance

variable.name: FSS36
variable.description: Code number of person conducting this interview?

variable.name: FSS37
variable.description: Person supplying information collected on this form?

variable.name: O_VISIT
variable.description: Indicates the visit number used for selecting study forms or central laboratory data.

variable.name: FSEQNO
variable.description: Form sequence number

variable.name: LINENO
variable.description: Line number

variable.name: FSS38
variable.description: Mode of interview

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: Visit number based on follow-up time

variable.name: FSS2FUT
variable.description: When did the stroke occur?

variable.name: FSS35FUT
variable.description: Date of data collection

variable.name: GARNETID
variable.description: GARNET ID
